about_the_game:
Classic Arcade Fun:
Experience the nostalgia of the classic Bomberman gameplay in a modernized version. Your objective is simple: navigate through mazes, place bombs strategically, and outsmart your opponents to be the last one standing!

Key Features:

Explosive Action: Engage in fast-paced battles with AI or other players, using bombs to blast through obstacles and defeat enemies.
Varied Levels: Enjoy a variety of challenging levels, each with unique layouts and obstacles that require different strategies.
Power-Ups: Collect power-ups to gain special abilities, such as increased speed, additional bombs, and more powerful explosions.

Whether you're a longtime fan of Bomberman or new to the genre, this game offers hours of explosive fun and strategic gameplay. Get ready to blow up the competition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 or Higher
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None

short_description: Blast through mazes in this modern take on classic bomb placing gameplay. Strategically place bombs, outsmart AI opponents, and collect power-ups in thrilling single-player action!
